Recover_Username_Subheading: Enter the email associated with your account
Recover_Password_Subheading: Enter the email associated with your account
Recover_Confirm_Password_Subheading:
Enter a new password for your account.
Recommended length at least 8 characters.
Login_Error_Subheading: The username and/or password you entered were incorrect. Please try again.
Recovery_Request_Submitted_Desc: If there is an Orva account associated with the email address you provided, we will send you an email reminder of your username.
Password_Reset_Request_Submitted_Desc: If there is an Orva account associated with the username you provided, we will send you a secure link to reset your password.
Case_Delete_Heading: You are about to delete this case
Case_Delete_Subheading: Deleting this case will remove it from the list of cases for today in this room. Deleting this case will only affect the case in Orva, it will not affect the patient’s medical record.
Please_submit_and_close_your_active_case: Please submit and close your active case for this room before starting another case.
This_will_help_ORVA_to_recognize_and_und:
This will help ORVA to recognize and understand
your voice and accent more effectively.
Lets_train_Orva:
Let’s train Orva to recognize you while speaking five example
voice commands commonly used in the app, shown above.
To_help_ensure_accurate_training:
To help ensure accurate training, we’ll need five good
samples for each voice command, displayed below.
Great: Great! One sample down, four to go for this voice command.
Thank: Thank you for taking the time to train Orva to recognize and understand your unique voice. Please note it may take up to a day for the training to fully take effect.
Review: Review your audio sample below to ensure it sounds right.
Are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_the_reco: Are you sure you want to delete the recording?
Notify_when_First: Notify when First Case Start Time is delayed 30 minutes
Notify_when_Turnover: Notify when Turnover Time exceeds 30 minutes
No_active_case_running_for_this_OT:
No active case
running for this OT
No_active_case_subtitle: When a case starts the active case will be shown here in the tracker screen
after_fiver_secs: You will be logged out in
submitted_cases_list_header_text: Submitted Cases in the Last 7 Days
Anesthesia_has_recorded_subheading: Anesthesia has already been recorded. You can add a revised time for all milestones from the Case Summary.
Patient_awake_has_recorded_heading: Patient's awake has already been recorded
Patient_awake_has_recorded_subheading: Patient's awake has already been recorded. You can add a revised time for all milestones from the Case Summary.
Timeout_has_recorded_subheading: Timeout has already been recorded. You can add a revised time for all milestones from the Case Summary.
notes_placeholder:
No voice notes have been recorded yet.

Just say “Hey Orva, note...” to voice capture clinical events, equipment, materials, and more.

 •  Orva AI auto classifies notes for you.
 •  Edit tags and notes anytime (just tap the three dots).
Your_notification_settings_have_been_sav: Your notification settings have been saved
No_Microphone_Access_Subtitle: Please allow microphone permissions to ensure that Orva is able to listen to you.
Inactivity_Alert_Desc: For security purposes, your session will end due to inactivity. Tap below to stay logged in or to log out now.
Inactivity_Timer_Text: You will be logged out in
Session_Timeout_Alert_Desc: For security purposes, your session will end. Tap below to log out now.
Session_Timeout_Timer_Text: You will be logged out in
Delete_Voice_Note_Subheading: You are about to delete this voice note from the case. Voice notes cannot be recovered once deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Last_Case_of_the_Day_Submitted: Last Case of the Day Submitted
Last_Case_Sub_Heading: Timers for this room will stop unless a new case is added for today.
Account_Information_Desc: Please contact an Orva Administrator to change your username or email address
We_sent_a_link_to_reset_your_password_to: We sent a link to reset your password to
Password_Req_Heading: Passwords must meet the following criteria:
Enter_Otp_Text: In order to proceed, please enter the one-time password sent to the email address associated with your account.
Otp_Note: Please note OTPs are only valid for 10 minutes after they are initially sent.
Password_Change_Success_Heading: You can now log in to Orva
Password_Change_Success_Desc: Thank you for updating your password. You can now log in to your Orva account on supported devices in your hospital.
Password_Change_Error_Desc: Your password was not updated. Please try setting up your password again or contact your admin for further assistance.
Check_the_inbox_associated_with_your_acc: Check the inbox associated with your account
Password_Was_Incorrect_Please_Try_Again: The password you entered was incorrect, please try again
Check_Inbox_Associated_With_Account: Check the inbox associated with your account
onboarding_and_troubleshooting_desc: In-depth guidance on how to get the most from Orva.
Email_us_end_text: or fill out this form. We’ll respond in less than 24 hours.
Speech_Recognition_Desc: Knowing your native language helps Orva tune its speech models for optimal performance.
Allow_audio_alerts_desc: This applies to Orva wake word, voice commands, and voice notes.
Bluetooth_Status_Desc: If you are having difficulty connecting, check device Bluetooth Settings or refer to User Guide.
Please_enter_full_name_to_add_user: Please enter full name to add user
Reviewing_logged_voice_notes_desc: Reviewing logged voice notes for AI-powered ICD-10/CPT coding suggestions.
Update_missing_case_information_to_start: Update missing case information to start case
Timers_Placeholder:
To set up time trackers, say things like:

 •  “Start timer for antibiotic recheck in 10 minutes.” 
 •  “Set timer to call PACU in 30 minutes.”
Delete_Timer_Subheading: You are about to delete this timer from the case. Timers cannot be restarted once deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Delete_All_Timer_Subheading: You are about to delete all timers from the case. Timers cannot be restarted once deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Delete_Alarm_Subheading: You are about to delete this alarm from the case. Alarms cannot be restarted once deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Wake_Word_Threshold_Desc: Adjust the wake word threshold to control the sensitivity of Orva's speech detection.
Audio_Device_Selector_Desc: Select the audio device to use for Orva's speech recognition.
Milestone_Skipped: Milestone skipped, please complete before closing case
Please_enter_procedure_name_for: To add new procedure enter in format CPT Code - NAME
Internet_Connected: Internet connection is restored. Your data will now be saved.
Confirm_Case_Data_Desc: Confirming “Wheels Out” means the information is accurate. You will be automatically logged out after that, but you can still edit case details in the Cases section until 11:59 PM today.
Enter_your_two_initials_and_press_Start_: Enter your two initials and press Start Cleaning
Enter_your_two_initials_and_press_Submit: Enter your two initials and press Submit
Room_Clean_Input_Placeholder: Enter your initials here e.g (YN for Your Name)
Connectivity_Timeout_Timer_Text: You will be logged out in
Connectivity_Timeout_Alert_Desc: Your session is paused due to a network interruption. Please log out and back in to continue.
Case_Reset_Subheading: Resetting will clear all progress made on this case. Any data entered so far will be removed and cannot be undone.
Removing_Data_Field_Subheading: Are you sure you want to remove this field from documentation.
Confirm_SMS_Subheading: Check the recipient and message before sending.
